#summary Homepage of Eclipse CodeSearch

= Introduction =

Eclipse CodeSearch is a nifty plugin for eclipse that lets you search through existing open source code using Google CodeSearch. If you don't know what's Google CodeSearch go to http://codesearch.google.com and type "System.out.println".


= Installation Instructions =

  # Download the zip file from the downloads page
  # Unzip it in your eclipse installation directory
  # Start eclipse

You should have a new view available in Window->Show View->Other...

= Using Eclipse CodeSearch =

Just type a function name or any piece of code into the search bar and pres Enter. An example  of usage of that code should appear in the minibrowser.

= Future Releases =

  * ability to navigate between different results
  * issuing the search from your editor
  * opening the result in a separate window
  * automatically performing the search for the word under the cursor
